SAMPLE.TITLE: S1 ray cells
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: ray parenchymal cells collected by laser capture microdissection from tangential cryosections of developing xylem (replicate 1 split across 4 lanes)

SAMPLE.TITLE: S1 whole sections
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: tangential cryosections (30um) of developing xylem (replicate 1 split across 4 lanes)

SAMPLE.TITLE: S1 xylem tracheids
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: xylem tracheids collected by laser capture microdissection from tangential cryosections of developing xylem (replicate 1 split across 4 lanes)

SAMPLE.TITLE: S2 ray cells
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: ray parenchymal cells collected by laser capture microdissection from tangential cryosections (30um) of developing xylem (replicate 2 split across 4 lanes)

SAMPLE.TITLE: S2 whole sections
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: tangential cryosections (30um) of developing xylem (replicate 2 split across 4 lanes)

SAMPLE.TITLE: S2 xylem tracheids
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: xylem tracheids collected by laser capture microdissection from tangential cryosections of developing xylem (replicate 2 split across 4 lanes)
